n in 
pregnancy and childbirth.
The	pelvic	floor	consists	
of layers of muscles which 
stretch like a supportive 
hammock from the pubic bone 
(in front) to the base of the 
backbone. During pregnancy 
you	may	find	that	you	leak	
urine when you cough or 
strain. This is known as stress 
incontinence of urine and it 
can continue after pregnancy.
By	performing	pelvic	floor	
exercises,  you strengthen 
the	pelvic	floor	muscles	and	
this helps to reduce or avoid 
5
46
this problem after pregnancy.
